CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 23, 1959, reads: "Award to Mrs. Tolliver - Because of her unusual achievements in the religious and civic sphere, Mrs. H.R. Tolliver, left, was presented the Sojourner Truth Award by the Pittsburgh Club of the Negro Business and Professional Women, during its Founders Day breakfast. Mrs. Mary Jane Page, center, presents that plaque, while Mrs. Katie Everette Johnson, the general chairman, registers approval. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four women, including, from left to right, Marion Sappington Bryant, H.R. Tolliver accepting Sojourner Truth Award plaque from Mary Jane Page and Katie Everette Johnson on behalf of the Pittsburgh Club of the Negro Business and Professional Women, standing in the Pittsburgh Room at the Penn Sheraton Hotel
